column2: Ambac sues Bank of America over Countrywide mortgage bonds NEW YORK Ambac Assurance Corp sued Bank of America Corp to recoup hundreds of millions of dollars of losses from insuring roughly $1.68 billion of securities backed at least in part by risky mortgages from the bank's Countrywide Home Loans unit. ~UPDATE 1-Ambac sues Bank of America over Countrywide mortgage bonds NEW YORK
